Sloop.Name: Sloop
Sloop.Ability:
Pirate' AFFINITY, Before deploy shuffle all allied 'Pirate's into the deck
Allied 'Pirate's gain 1 Health
1PT: Steal or gain 1 gold

Brigantine.Name: Brigantine
Brigantine.Ability:
Pirate' AFFINITY, Before deploy shuffle all allied 'Pirate's into the deck
1PT, INVESTIGATE Unit 1; Add 1 'Pirate'
Allied 'Pirate's cost in hand is reduced by 1 (Min 1)

Frigate.Name: Frigate
Frigate.Ability:
Pirate' AFFINITY, Before deploy shuffle all allied 'Pirate's into the deck
1PT, Target Unit; Silence it
Allied 'Pirate's and 'Ship's gain 2 DR

Galleon.Name: Galleon
Galleon.Ability:
Pirate' AFFINITY, Before deploy shuffle all allied 'Pirate's into the deck
Allied 'Pirate' abilities deal 1 extra damage
1PT, Target Enemy: Deal it 3 Damage

Man O' War.Name: Man O' War
Man O' War.Ability:
Pirate' AFFINITY, Before deploy shuffle all allied 'Pirate's into the deck
'Pirate's gain 1 Power
1PT, Target 'Pirate': It gains RUSH and an additional Attack

Ferry of the Damned.Name: Ferry of the Damned
Ferry of the Damned.Ability:
Pirate' AFFINITY, Before deploy shuffle all allied 'Pirate's into the deck
'Undead' units gain 1 Power
Slow 1PT Deploy a 'Pirate' from grave additionally as 'Undead'
